original: Littorin, Gustaf Samuel, kapten, godsägare. Lindevad säteri, Skänninge, f. 26/8/86 i V. Stenby, östergötl. 1. G. 17 m. Greta Hansen. Skänninge stads hush :gille, i Allhelg. kristidsförb., i AHhelg. m. fl. s mars polisförb., v. ordf. i kyrkofullm. o. folksk :styr., ordf. i Göstrings här. allmänn :styr., led. av styr. f. östergötl. Ensk. Banks avd:-kont. i Skänninge sed. 24, lantbr omb. i östergötl. 1. hushisällsk. sed. 24, led. av kommrfuHm. o. kyrkoråd sed. 22 samt östergötl. lantarb :giv :-fören. m. m. RVO, ProPatrstGM.
translated: Littorin, Gustaf Samuel, captain, landowner. Lindevad estate, Skänninge, born 26/8/86 in V. Stenby, Östergötland. 1st marriage: married to Greta Hansen in 17. Children: Sture born in 18, Inger in 19, Sven in 25. Studied: graduated from high school in 07, studied commerce in 08. Captain in the Göta artillery regiment. Owner and manager of Lindevad estate, Allhelgona s. Chairman of the local council and the local committee in Allhelgona since 22, in Göstrings with Skänninge town's household guild, in Allhelgona with wartime association, in Allhelgona with the March police association, vice chairman of the church council and the public school board, chairman of the county board of Göstrings, member of the board of directors of Östergötland's branch of Enskilda Bank since 24, agricultural representative in Östergötland's household society since 24, member of the local council and the church council since 22, as well as Östergötland's agricultural employers' association and more. Recipient of the Order of the Polar Star, the Pro Patria Medal of Merit.

memberOf.name: Östergötland's branch of Enskilda Bank
